about_the_game:
Introduction

In each life cycle, choose your traits, set attributes, and explore a unique and fulfilling life!

Romantic Life uses a near Roguelike gameplay process where you can choose from dozens of unique Life Traits, after which you will be assigned Attribute Points to Four of your character's Attributes: Charisma, Energy, Intelligence, and Wealth. Each attribute affects the events you encounter in your subsequent life experience. Once the attributes have been assigned, you can control the direction of your life in each year through the life options, and decide for yourself whether your life path will become wider or narrower.

Features

In different life experiences, you will have the opportunity to meet different women with different personalities, whether it's a female teacher who secretly tutors, a maid from a poor family, or a female boss with vicious words, etc., you will be able to trigger a variety of different strategy routes and discover their very different sides!

  • Randomized multi-round gameplay experience.

  • Each character has a different route.

  • All CGs and storylines can be unlocked with a single click.

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted are 18+.
Contains suggestive text and language that may imply adult themes.
Not suitable for workplace settings.
